help_desc1: Click the buttom will consume LUT and flip a pattern
help_desc2: Ater 5 adjacent pattern in horizontal, vertical and diagonal fliped, will active star sign prize (Click to Receive)
help_desc3: The ultimate prize will actived after you received all star sign's prize (Click to receive).
help_desc4: Will start a round game after you reveive all the prize.
help_desc5: You can click AUTO to flip continuously, and click STOP to end at anytime.
help_desc6: If AUTO flip a flipped pattern, will return half consumed LUT.
